name: Dog Cooling Bandana – 2 Pack Instant Chill Neck Scarf for Dogs, Summer Cooling Collar for Small Medium Large Pets, Reusable Breathable Nylon Ice Bandana for Outdoor Heat Relief (Large)
short_description: Instant Cooling Relief for Pets：Made from breathable nylon, this dog cooling bandana provides instant cooling relief by simply soaking in water. Perfect for summer walks, hikes, or outdoor play, it helps your furry friend stay comfortable and avoid overheating.

Reusable & Eco-Friendly Material：Our pet cooling scarf uses high-quality nylon that’s lightweight, safe, and durable. Simply soak, wring, and wear again – no need for refrigeration or batteries. A sustainable solution to beat the heat!

Comfortable Adjustable Fit：Designed with pet comfort in mind, this dog bandana fits snugly yet gently around the neck with adjustable velcro. Suitable for small, medium, and large dog breeds, it allows free movement while staying securely in place.

Dual-Use Cooling Bandana：More than just a neck collar – wear it around the neck or as a stylish head wrap. A fashionable and functional summer accessory for your pet, ideal for outdoor adventures, travel, and sports.

Pack of 2 – Blue & Cyan Colors：Includes 2 cooling bandanas in refreshing blue and cyan, offering a cool rotation and stylish variety. A must-have summer essential to keep your pet happy, safe, and stylish in hot weather.
product_description: Keep your dog cool, safe, and stylish this summer with our Dog Cooling Bandana – 2 Pack! Made from soft and breathable nylon, these bandanas offer a natural and reusable cooling solution for your pet. Just soak in water, wring out, and wrap around your dog’s neck for immediate heat relief. Perfect for walks, beach days, camping, or any outdoor fun! Each pack includes two vibrant colors – blue and cyan – to match your dog’s personality and keep them fresh and fashionable. The lightweight design and adjustable closure ensure a comfortable fit for dogs of all sizes. Whether you’re protecting your pup from the heat or simply adding a pop of cool style, these cooling collars are a summer must-have! How to Use: Soak the bandana in clean water Wring out excess water Place it around your dog’s neck Reusable, chemical-free, and easy to clean – it’s the perfect summer accessory for every dog! Warm tip: If your pet's neck circumference is between two sizes, it is recommended to choose one size up!

name: Summer Dog Bandana for Large X-Large Dogs 18-23" Neck - Reversible Hello Summer Popsicle Scarf, Breathable Lightweight for Beach Pool Party Blue
short_description: [1] REVERSIBLE SAME DESIGN: Features vibrant “Hello Summer” text with popsicle prints on both sides. No ugly underside if it flips! The refreshing blue color adds instant summer flair, ensuring your pup looks perfect from every angle.

[2] ADJUSTABLE SIZE XL (18–23" NECK): 30" long edge. Engineered for Large to X-large breeds such as Labs, German Shepherds and Boxers. Triangle tie-on design lets dogs move, play & nap comfortably. Measure & leave room to tie knot for perfect fit.

[3] LIGHTWEIGHT & QUICK-DRY: Smooth, breathable polyester with reinforced stitching for cool, irritation-free fit. Fade-resistant double-layer design keeps colors vibrant and holds crisp shape through wet & sunny summer adventures.

[4] SUMMER BEACH READY: The cute popsicle and cherry design creates a fun look for pool parties, BBQ gatherings, beach trips, or daily walks. Capture the perfect Instagram-worthy photo of your pup enjoying the heatwave.

[5] MACHINE WASHABLE & COOLING HACK: Simply toss in the washer for easy cleanup. Pro Tip: Dampen and freeze briefly to use as a cooling bandana! A refreshing, practical gift for dog-loving friends and family this summer.
